caption.center: LLEWELLYN K. WAILEHUA, JR., Petitioner Pro-se, v. KEVIN CHANG, CIRCUIT
COURT JUDGE (Former); CORRECTIONS CORPORATION OF AMERICA; et al.; GAIL

opinion.posture: APPLICATION FOR A WRIT OF MANDAMUS AND PROHIBITION DIRECTED TO A PUBLIC OFFICIAL (Civ. No. 99-1683)
opinion.panel: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, RAMIL, and ACOBA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER Upon consideration of Petitioner Llewellyn K. Wailehua's application for a writ of mandamus and prohibition directed to a public official, the papers in support, and the records and files herein, it appears that Petitioner fails to demonstrate that he is entitled to a writ of mandamus or prohibition. Therefore,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the petition is denied without prejudice to any remedy Petitioner may have in the underlying circuit court case.
